definition: bruised/riddled with scars
to injure/injury/wound
scar/traces
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated

sentences.english: His scar tissue came from battles both actual and political.
sentences.chinese: 他在軍事戰鬥和政治鬥爭中都傷痕累累。

sentences.english: Her arm was black and blue from the accident.
sentences.chinese: 她的手臂因車禍而傷痕累累。

sentences.english: Some only have memories of a broken off a touch the hearts of the already scarred.
sentences.chinese: 有的只是曾經一斷一斷回憶觸動着本已傷痕累累的心。

sentences.english: There is only a broken memories a touch of this has wounds to heart.
sentences.chinese: 有的只是曾經一斷一斷回憶觸動着本已傷痕累累的心。

sentences.english: The old trapper’s hut beneath Singing Mountain bears the scars of an unwelcome visitor.
sentences.chinese: 在辛寧山腳下的狩獵人小屋被不速之客弄得傷痕累累。

sentences.english: The past has been scarred by countless perversions of justice.
sentences.chinese: 無數的是非顛倒使過去的歲月傷痕累累。

sentences.english: It was now mid-morning and the Swedish army had already been devastated.
sentences.chinese: 現在是上午時分，此時瑞典軍隊已經傷痕累累。

sentences.english: Why do some religions have rituals that are so much more traumatic than others?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有的宗教儀式讓人傷痕累累，有的卻不這樣？

sentences.english: They were more and more raw and skinless.
sentences.chinese: 它們越來越傷痕累累，皮也快沒了。

definition: to be unable to withstand a single blow/to collapse at the first blow
to no avail/of no use
to damn/to curse/to revile
see 百孔千瘡|百孔千疮[bai3 kong3 qian1 chuang1]
to be obsessive/to persist obstinately
scattered and smashed (idiom)
covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises
at a loss to know what to do (idiom); bewildered
to throw off/to struggle free of/Taiwan pr. [zheng1 tuo1]
both sides suffer (idiom)/neither side wins
to be of no interest to anyone (idiom)
to remain unmoved
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
victor/winner
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
incoherent speech/to talk without rhyme or reason (idiom)
